UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Metal-binding and nuclease activity of an antimicrobial peptide analogue of the salivary histatin 5.
Literature.Author: Melino S, Gallo M, Trotta E, Mondello F, Paci M, Petruzzelli R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(IC50=6.25µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans SA40(IC50=6.5µg/ml),Candida albicans SA40(MFC=12.5µg/ml)
